titles.title: Sea Turtle Rescue Assistance and Rehabilitation Act of 2023
Sea Turtle Rescue Assistance and Rehabilitation Act of 2023
Sea Turtle Rescue Assistance and Rehabilitation Act of 2023
Sea Turtle Rescue Assistance Act of 2023
To require the Secretary of Commerce to establish the Sea Turtle Rescue Assistance Grant Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife, and Fisheries.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife, and Fisheries Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 118-433.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 358.

action.text: Mr. Tiffany moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2560.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 332 - 82 (Roll no. 111).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary:
Sea Turtle Rescue Assistance and Rehabilitation Act of 2023
This bill requires the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration to establish a Sea Turtle Rescue Assistance and Rehabilitation Grant Program to encourage and facilitate coordinated rapid response and rescue of stranded marine turtles.
